    T TransactionParametersBuilder.lookupParams​(AlgodClient client)

  • Uses of AlgodClient in com.algorand.algosdk.transaction

    Methods in com.algorand.algosdk.transaction with parameters of type AlgodClient
    Modifier and Type Method Description
    AtomicTransactionComposer.ExecuteResult AtomicTransactionComposer.execute​(AlgodClient client, int waitRounds)
    Send the transaction group to the network and wait until it's committed to a block.
    java.util.List<java.lang.String> AtomicTransactionComposer.submit​(AlgodClient client)
    Send the transaction group to the network, but don't wait for it to be committed to a block.
